attributes.action: Consider how a successful economy should be measured, without impacting on global resources
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can we measure a successful economy whilst  continuing to deplete global resources?  Can we continue to measure success only by measures of increased consumption.  Can the Governments of the world adapt, to allow for the fact, that, in the long term we have  limited resources of water and minerals an are damaging the chances of long term survival.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
